consultantPending.content: Your account is currently unverified and your application is pending approval. Please check back again within 24 hours.

consultantNotPending.content: Your account is currently unverified. Please complete and submit your application for verification.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.content: Your account has been disabled by the administrator due to security reasons or policy violations. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact us.

companyPending.content: Your account is currently unverified. You may still create engagements and seek matches, but you will need to be verified before you can be matched with a consultant.

companyNotPending.content: Your account is currently unverified. You may still create engagements and seek matches, but you will need to be verified before you can be matched with a consultant.

errors.hasPayments: Este prestamo ya tiene pagos y no puede borrarse

There's no invoices for this month: No hay facturas en este mes
The percentage can't be greater than 100: El porcentaje no puede ser mayor a 100%
This loan already has payments and can't: Este prestamo ya tiene pagos y no puede borrarse
Source account balance (:balance) is low: El balance de la cuenta de origen (:balance) es menor al monto del prestamo (:amount), por favor transfiera a esta cuenta :accountName
This unit is currently rented: Esta unidad esta en renta actualmente
This rent has payments and can't be elim: Este contrato tiene pagos  y tienen que ser eliminados primero
This property has contracts and can't be: Esta propiedad tiene contratos que tienen que ser eliminados primero
The payment entered is more than the tot: El pago de la factura es mayor al total de la factura, por favor revise e intente de nuevo
You have :count contracts close to expir: Tiene :count contratos proximos a expirar en :days dias
Initial steps to setup your system: Pasos iniciales para configurar el sistema
Your contacts: Borrowers, Tenants and Ow: Tus contactos: Clientes de prestamos, Inquilinos y Propietarios, son una parte esencial del sistema. Puedes crearlos desde aqui
Add loans, register installment payments: Agrega prestamos, registra pago de cuotas en el modulo de prestamos
If you are going to borrow money you fir: Si vas a usar el modulo de prestamo, primero se necesitaria aperturar la cuenta de prestamos
Before using the app you should setup yo: Antes de usar la aplicacion se debe configurar los datos de la empresa pulsando el boton de abajo
